name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fat Finger Guard - For NFT Marketplaces

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Prevent fat-fingered orders with a warning interface

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will present warnings when setting an NFT bid/sell order over/below a configurable threshold. An an additional button  will be added to the checkout flow to encourage user consideration before making a purchase. No more fat finger orders!

- Currently supports Blur.io
